mapper.sql: area_id, area_code, area_name, area_province_id, area_city_id, area_show_order, area_memo_info, area_create_time, area_stop_flag
mapper.select:
select t1.area_name province,t2.area_name city from t_area_info t1,t_area_info t2 where t2.area_code=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.area_id=(select min(area_id)-1 from t_area_info where area_province_id=(select area_province_id from t_area_info where area_code=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

select area_code,area_name,area_province_id from t_area_info where 1=1
and area_province_id = '0'
and area_province_id = ( select area_province_id from t_area_info where area_id=((select area_id from t_area_info where area_code=#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+1)) and area_city_id='0'
mapper.insert:
insert into t_area_info
area_id,
area_code,
area_name,
area_province_id,
area_city_id,
area_show_order,
area_memo_info,
area_create_time,
area_stop_flag,
#{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaShowOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaMemoInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{areaStopFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_area_info
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_province_id = #{areaProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_city_id = #{areaCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_show_order = #{areaShowOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_memo_info = #{areaMemoInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_create_time = #{areaCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
area_stop_flag = #{areaStopFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_area_info set area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_province_id = #{areaProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_city_id = #{areaCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_show_order = #{areaShowOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_memo_info = #{areaMemoInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_create_time = #{areaCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, area_stop_flag = #{areaStopFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
